citations.desc: Procurement of dogs, cats, and other animals; dealers.
citations.narrative:
While reviewing acquisition records, it was determined that on 11/20/2023 the facility obtained a 4 year old female serval
by the name of “Sarabi” from an individual that did not hold a current USDA license. All licensees must acquire wild and
exotic animals used for covered purposes from a USDA licensed facility. A license is required to ensure all parties are in
compliance with the Animal Welfare Act. No dealer shall knowingly obtain any dog, cat, or other animal from any person
who is required to be licensed but who does not hold a current, valid, and unsuspended license.
Correct from this date forward, January 8, 2026.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.132(d) 
   
Procurement of dogs, cats, and other animals; dealers. 
While reviewing acquisition records, it was determined that on 11/20/2023 the facility obtained a 4 year old female serval 
by the name of “Sarabi” from an individual that did not hold a current USDA license. All licensees must acquire wild and 
exotic animals used for covered purposes from a USDA licensed facility. A license is required to ensure all parties are in 
compliance with the Animal Welfare Act. No dealer shall knowingly obtain any dog, cat, or other animal from any person 
who is required to be licensed but who does not hold a current, valid, and unsuspended license.  
Correct from this date forward, January 8, 2026. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
